title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
description:
Users think about which tasks they need to
complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be
organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories
(productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will
reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps â€“ helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app
suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context
Stores.
